name: Junkyard Frog
description:
Made using the Godot engine // Press Space or Enter to skip the intro at the beginning

This is my submission for the 2021 Sonic Amateur Games Expo, "Junkyard Frog". You play as "The Garbage Man" who's trying to get all his trash back from the pesky frog who ate it all. Think you're up for the challenge? Travel through different areas, chasing after this monstrous frog, and get your trash back!

Special thank you to hiulit on GitHub for the Godot 2D CRT Shader

===============================================================

CONTROLS:

Left Arrow, A, or Z: Switch Direction to the Left

Right Arrow, D, or C: Switch Direction to the Right

Up Arrow, W, X, or the Space Bar: Jump

Esc: Pause the Game

Enter: Select on Menus

==============================================================
